name: Dark Lepra style
description:
Dark theme for leprosorium.ru
Use https://github.com/a2nt/styling-kit to create UI styles
css:
@-moz-document domain(leprosorium.ru) {::-webkit-scrollbar{width:10px}::-webkit-scrollbar-track{width:10px;-webkit-box-shadow:none;background:#000;box-shadow:none;border-left:1px solid #232322}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{-webkit-box-shadow:none;-webkit-border-radius:0;border-radius:0;background:#908b67;box-shadow:none}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:window-inactive{background:#908b67;box-shadow:none}::-webkit-input-placeholder{color:#908b67}:-moz-placeholder{color:#908b67;opacity:1}::-moz-placeholder{color:#908b67;opacity:1}:-ms-input-placeholder{color:#908b67}::-ms-input-placeholder{color:#908b67}::placeholder{color:#908b67}::selection{background:#908b67;color:#191919}::-moz-selection{background:#908b67;color:#191919}a,input,select{transition:all .3s ease}body,html{height:auto!important;min-height:100%!important;font-family:Roboto,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif}.b-list_item_blog_controls .b-subscribe_button_text,.b-subdomain_aside_subscribe
